title: Bún Chả (Grilled Pork and Rice Vermicelli) - VIETNAMESE FOOD

json.text:
What's up guys, I'm in this restaurant
that serves Bun Cha, and Bun Cha

is essentially like grilled fatty pork
and also comes with a giant bed of mixed

greens, like Thai basil and cilantro and
lettuce and other stuff like that. There's

slices of carrot and like radish, I think.
You know me, I like to add red chilies

to everything. I'm going to kind of put
it in there like that.

There's also this garlic vinegar sauce.
I'm gonna get a little bit, gotta throw

it in there for a little kick.
Alright, I'm going to try to get a

piece of the meat with the leaf and some
noodles. Alright, let's go for this.
Interesting combination of flavors, wow, I really was not expecting that.

It almost tastes like mint, maybe there
is mint in here. Oh yeah, there is.
There's mint right here. That is a great touch. Mmm mint.

Mixes well with the fatty pork, the garlic
vinegar that I just put in there, the red

chilies, the noodles are very soft and
light, this was an amazing meal.

I've never had this before.
I'm going to go for that broth.
Oh god, so good.  It's so good guys. Vietnamese food just doesn't get old.

Let's go ahead and dunk these noodles, mix it all
up. There's more red chilies. Gotta have
those red chilies!
So besides the fatty piece of pork, I found an actual like little mini sausage patty.

I'm was just so happy that there's mint, I
love mint. I got some mint, and red chili on there.

Those chilies give it
just like the right touch of heat, so good.

It mixes with that sweet kind of
flavor to the broth and the meat.
Sweet and spicy, gotta love it!
Got another piece of one of those pork patties.

Just eating the greens like right out of
the basket. So good.
Cảm ơn. (Thank you)

Yet another Vietnamese meal
where I walk away completely stuffed.

That was delicious, my god, Bun Cha...
how have I not had that ever in my life

before? I highly recommend it. It was only
30,000 VND ($1.32 USD), so once again another meal

that's roughly like a dollar and change.
It's just so affordable to eat out here.

It's ridiculous!
I hope you guys enjoyed this quick video

and stay tuned for more, subscribe, like,
support me on Patreon, all that other
good stuff. Catch you guys later, bye!!!
